title: Consider Relationship Patterns
text: When you find a pattern in the data, like people who like pistachio also liking strawberry, think about other possible related patterns.

title: Linking Preferences and Behavior
text: Understanding why people who like one thing also like another can reveal deeper insights into their preferences.

title: Exploring Broader Taste Preferences
text: Think about whether this shared liking indicates a broader taste or preference pattern beyond just strawberry and pistachio.

title: Consider Additional Factors
text: Consider what else might be common among these individuals beyond their ice cream flavor preference.
